description: This table contains additional information about patient order templates.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The order template ID.

columns.name: CREATED_FROM_ORD_ID
columns.description: If this order template (OTP) was created by adding an external order to a plan, this is the order it was created from.

columns.name: WT_MAX_DOSE
columns.description: This column stores the saved weight- or body surface area- based maximum dose for the treatment plan.

columns.name: WT_MAX_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the saved unit for the weight- or body surface area-based maximum dose for the treatment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MAX_DOSE_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column returns the source of max dose information for an order template that was used in the treatment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Preference List


Order Set


Treatment Plan Protocol


Medication


Order Panel or Group


Other


Dose Rule


Similar Order

columns.name: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN
columns.description:
This is the Patient Order Template (OTP) level setting that indicates if the medication being ordered should be marked as "Do Not Dispense" by default.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: MAX_DAILY_DOSE
columns.description: Max daily dose value for the order template (OTP) as entered by the provider. This will be shown only for outpatient orders based on the configuration for Max daily dose highest DEA code (I LSD 35050) and Max daily dose meds grouper (I LSD 35051).

columns.name: MAX_DLY_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Max daily dose unit (associated with I OTP 34195) for the order template as entered by the provider. This will be shown only for outpatient orders based on the configuration of Max daily dose highest DEA code (I LSD 35050) and Max daily dose meds grouper (I LSD 35051).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: WT_MAX_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: MAXDOSE_HARDSTOP_YN
columns.description:
Indicate whether the max dose limit is hard stop or not. If "Yes", the max dose is hard stop. Otherwise, the max dose is not hard stop.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: CREATED_FROM_OTL_ID
columns.description: Stores the order template (OTL) ID from which this treatment plan order is sourced from.

columns.name: MED_REFILL_PROV_ID
columns.description: This item contains the refill route provider for the order

columns.name: HOLD_PENDING_PA_YN
columns.description:
This item determines if a prior authorization request should be sent for a medication order when it is signed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: SEND_PA_REQ_YN
columns.description:
This item specifies the payer that a prior authorization request should be sent to when a medication order is signed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: PA_ORG_ID
columns.description: This item specifies the payer that a prior authorization request should be sent to when the order is signed.

columns.name: PA_ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: RATE_IS_CALCULATED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the rate stored in this record is a calculated value


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: VOLUME_IS_CALCULATED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the volume stored in this record is a calculated value


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: PREP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the current prep status of an order template


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Never Prepared


Prepared


Out of Date

columns.name: MOD_FROM_OTP_ID
columns.description: If this order template was created by modifying a released order, then this item will store the ID of the original released order template.

columns.name: SPEC_DOSE_LMT_HR
columns.description: The number of hours the dosing limit represents.

columns.name: SPEC_MED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This indicates that the record is a special type of medication, such as patient-controlled analgesia (PCA). This will be used to determine what type of dosing should be used for the medication.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Non-specific


Orderable


Simple Generic


Blood-Transfuse


Feedings


PCA


Blood-Prepare


Cyclic TPN


Feedings on MAR

columns.name: SCHED_DUR
columns.description: Amount of time (in minutes) the order should contribute to an appointment

columns.name: SCHED_DUR_IS_CALC_YN
columns.description:
Set to "yes" if the scheduling duration (I OTP 16000) was calculated by the system.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: SCHED_DUR_BUFFER
columns.description: The amount of time (in minutes) to add to the scheduling duration if it was calculated by the system.

columns.name: SCHED_TOL_BEF
columns.description: How far before the expected date can the appointment be safely made.

columns.name: SCHED_TOL_AFTR
columns.description: How long after the expected date can the appointment be safely made.

columns.name: SCHED_TOL_NO_RESTR_BEF_YN
columns.description:
Is "before-tolerance" any day before the expected date?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: SCHED_TOL_NO_RESTR_AFTR_YN
columns.description:
Is "after-tolerance" any day after the expected date?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: IS_BLOOD_YN
columns.description:
This column will be Yes if this treatment plan order is a prepare or transfuse blood order that uses the prepare or transfuse amount display item.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: TRANSFUSE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount of blood to transfuse in a treatment plan order.

columns.name: TRANSFUSE_AMOUNT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
If this is a blood transfusion treatment plan order, this is the unit in which it was ordered.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: WT_MAX_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: PREPARE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount of blood to prepare in a treatment plan order.

columns.name: PREPARE_AMOUNT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:

columns.description: The weight-based amount on this prepare or transfuse patient order template.

columns.description:
The weight-based unit on this prepare or transfuse patient order template.

columns.name: RELATIVE_EXPIRATION_DATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds a category value for the expiration date. This may be subtly different from the expiration date (OTP_INFO.STANDING_EXP_DATE) for things like "in 3 months", which could be S+90, S+91, or S+92 depending on the current date.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


On Date


Other (specify)


Today


Tomorrow


1 Week


2 Weeks


3 Weeks


4 Weeks


5 Weeks


6 Weeks


1 Month


2 Months


3 Months


4 Months


5 Months


6 Months


7 Months


8 Months


9 Months


10 Months


11 Months


12 Months


13 Months


14 Months


15 Months


16 Months


17 Months


18 Months


1 Year


2 Years


3 Years


4 Years


Before Surgery


Before Surgery


Before Next Appt

columns.name: FUTURE_RELATIVE_EXPECTED_DT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds a category value for the expected completion date. This may be subtly different from the expected date (OTP_INFO.FUT_EXPECT_COMP_DT) for things like "in 3 months", which could be S+90, S+91, or S+92 depending on the current date.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RELATIVE_EXPIRATION_DATE_C_NAME

columns.name: FUTURE_EXPECTED_DATE_COMMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds a category value for the comment part of expected date. This will include categories based on scheduling comments like "Before Surgery", "After Consult", etc.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RELATIVE_EXPIRATION_DATE_C_NAME

columns.name: FUTURE_EXPECTED_DATE_DETAILS
columns.description: Holds free-text details entered if the future expected date comment (FUTURE_EXPECTED_DATE_COMMENT_C) is "Other (Specify)".

columns.name: SAV_PAT_BLOODREQT_YN
columns.description:
Flags whether signing the blood order will also update the patient's blood special requirements


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_BLOOD_YN

columns.name: APPT_WINDOW_START_TIME
columns.description: Preferred appointment window. This is the start of the appointment window.

columns.name: APPT_WINDOW_END_TIME
columns.description: Preferred appointment window. This is the end of the appointment window.

columns.name: LEAVE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the type of medical leave being ordered.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Outpatient Sick Leave


Hospitalization Leave


Maternity Leave


Light Duty Only


Excuses Only

columns.name: LEAVE_START_DATE
columns.description: Start date of the medical leave.

columns.name: LEAVE_END_DATE
columns.description: End date of the medical leave.

columns.name: LEAVE_DURATION
columns.description: Duration of the medical leave in days.

columns.name: LEAVE_LIGHTDUTY_YN
columns.description:
Whether the medical leave also has a light duty period.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: LEAVE_LIGHTDUTY_START_DATE
columns.description: Start date of the light duty period.

columns.name: LEAVE_LIGHTDUTY_END_DATE
columns.description: End date of the light duty period.

columns.name: LEAVE_LIGHTDUTY_DURATION
columns.description: Duration of the light duty period in days.

columns.name: LEAVE_EXCUSED_ACTIVITIES_YN
columns.description:
Whether the patient should be excused from doing specific activities during the leave.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RX_DO_NOT_DISP_YN

columns.name: LEAVE_EXCUSED_START_DATE
columns.description: Start date of the excused activities period.

columns.name: LEAVE_EXCUSED_END_DATE
columns.description: End date of the excuse period.

columns.name: LEAVE_EXCUSED_DURATION
columns.description: Duration of the excuse period in days.

columns.name: LEAVE_EXCUSED_COMMENTS
columns.description: Comments about the excused activities for the excuse period.

columns.name: CONFIDENTIALITY_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores whether a medication order should be treated as confidential from the patient's proxies. Medications with this item set to Hide From Patient Proxies are hidden from the patient's proxies in MyChart and from the proxy-friendly After Visit Summary. If set to Not Confidential, or not set, the information is still shown to patient proxies, unless otherwise hidden. This item only applies to non-immunization medication orders.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Hidden From Proxies


Hide From Patient Proxies


Patient Is Too Young To Decide


Cannot Determine Will Of Patient

columns.name: PREVENT_RENEWAL_YN
columns.description:
Determines if renewals for this order should be disallowed.
